name: df-1stc
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(c1stc, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cuni(cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wral(s3, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s3))))))))))))
comment: Define the class of all first-countable topologies. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Aug-2009.)
